function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate isolation and quarantine facilities for infected individuals","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading contagious diseases within communities","Mitigation":"Improving and expanding quarantine facilities, implementing strict isolation measures","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, disinfection technology","People":"Infected individuals, at-risk individuals, general public","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Poor ventilation and sunlight in housing structures","Impact":"Increased risk of illness and decreased well-being among residents","Mitigation":"Improving ventilation systems, maximizing natural light exposure, promoting healthy building design","Technologies":"HVAC systems, building automation systems, daylighting systems","People":"Residents, occupants, building owners","Owner":"Architects, engineers, building owners"},{"Description":"Inadequate disinfection measures for contaminated items and spaces","Impact":"Higher risk of fomite transmission of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Implementing fumigation and disinfection stations, using heat and chemical treatments, separating contaminated and clean spaces","Technologies":"Disinfection chambers, fumigation systems, high-temperature heat treatment","People":"Public, workers, travelers","Owner":"Public facilities, transportation authorities"}]}
